title: Outlander's Heughan Looking for Unique Opportunities
itunes:title: Outlander's Heughan Looking for Unique Opportunities
description:
Actor and entrepreneur Sam Heughan discusses the impact of the pandemic on his whiskey brand and making his television show Outlander.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
